subsection.name: Java Runtime Environment
subsection.p: The Heritrix crawler is implemented purely in java. This means that the only true requirement for running it is that you have a JRE installed. The Heritrix crawler makes use of 1.4 features so your JRE must be at least of a 1.4.0 pedigree.

subsection.name: Linux
subsection.p: The Heritrix crawler has been built and tested on Linux only. We'll eventually get to other platforms but thats all that we've run on to date.
